*Near to the Black Tower:*

As Tuscon and the rest lay down their weapons, =
the other soldiers move to
encircle the Maximals and the Autobots. Insectic=
on, Bruticus-X, and Iguanus
moved in almost eagerly to pick up the mighty w=
eapons that Tuscon has
dropped, while Inferno, the self proclaimed bodyguar=
d of Hydras watched
Tuscon carefully, his optic ready to spot treachery.

Q=
uietly a short message is sent to Tuscon, =93Tuscon.=94 The deep voice of
N=
octorro, the leader of the Maximal Fuzors can be heard, =93My team is here.=

Rodimus sent us to aid you. None too soon it would seem.=94 Noctorro=92s w=
ords
are grim, a soldier=92s humor in them. =93We await your signal.=94

At=
 the same time Injector, Buzzclaw, Terrorgator, and Quickstrike move to do
=
the same with Kup, Nightshift, Straightshot, Talon and the others.
Skyshado=
w, the leader of the Predacon Fuzors just watches with a gloating
look on h=
is face, it is almost as if he wants them to attack and keep the
battle goi=
ng.

Meanwhile Phobia and several sweeps keep an eye on things from the air=
,
while Terrorsaur and Waspinator landed, ready to help out as needed.

At =
the same time Legacy processed Tuscon=92s command for him to leave the Ark.=

There was a long pause, and then the temporal guardian=92s cold voice come=
s
across the channel, =93I will not comply with your command. I have been t=
asked
with the . . . >*BZZZTT!*<

Deepstryke transmits to Hydras, =93Hydras=
. I am picking up an encrypted
transmissions to and from Tuscon, he is atte=
mpting to communicate with the
others. I am generating a radio dampening fi=
eld now in this area. Only the
Predacons will be able to transmit.=94


*Me=
anwhile inside the Black Tower:*

Windlord=92s attempt to open fire on the =
Scourge was met with a measure of
futility. Scourge just stepped away from =
the opening that Windlord fired out
from and let the shots go harmlessly in=
to a bulkhead, scorching it only
slightly.

However that slight amount of t=
ime allowed Windlord and Rat Trap time to
scurry further into their crawl s=
pace and find an interior bulkhead to hide
behind.

=93Scrap!=94 Scourge=92=
s voice said from the outside. There was a pause and then,
=93Cyclonus, the=
y have fled into the walls.=94

There was another pause, and then Scourge c=
huckled, =93Of course. I will be
ready for them.=94

From further inside th=
e crawl space the sounds of chittering could be heard,
and then several gro=
ups of optics could be seen in the distance coming
towards Rat Trap and Win=
dlord. In the darkness their shapes could only be
barely made out, but they=
 looked like black metallic spiders, Hydras=92 wall
guardians!

(OOC: Rat T=
rap may recognize them from last time. Also keep in mind that Rat
Trap and =
Windlord should be in beast mode. They would have to be to fit
inside the c=
rawl space. In the toon the Beast Modes did not have offensive
weaponry, ex=
cept for teeth and claws)

*Outside the Ark:*

Rodimus was positioned in a =
small grove of trees, ducking down behind
several large rocks. He gives Qui=
ckstride a quizzical look as the equine
Maximal sniffed him.

(OOC: Quickst=
ride=92s sniff reveals nothing wrong.)

He was about to let Quickstride in =
on what he had planned when Uproar
appeared. Rodimus appears taken aback th=
ough by Uproar=92s conclusion that it
was Legacy that had turned evil. Whil=
e Rodimus didn=92t know that much about
Legacy, having only seen him briefl=
y while being rescued and repaired, there
was nothing to hint that this att=
ack was Legacy=92s doing. He was about to say
something when Uproar ran tow=
ards the Ark to be let in . . .

>KRACK POW<

As Uproar ran towards the Ark=
, what seemed like a round bolt of lightening
appeared, sending Uproar flyi=
ng several yards through the air, to land
heavily on the ground! Evidently =
the Ark shielding was still in place, and
it was not allowing anyone in.

R=
odimus frowned, =93Uproar! Get over here! If we are going to get back in,
t=
hen we need to work together. That shield is supposed to hold off all the
P=
redacon forces. We are not going to get in by brute force.=94

As Rodimus t=
alked three other Maximals seemed to almost materialize out of
the underbru=
sh, such was their skills at camouflage.

The first was Wing Caliber, (See:=
 http://tfwiki.net/wiki/Skywarp ) an old
Maximal stratagist and military te=
acher, who from the brownish feathers
along his frame turned into some sort=
 of eagle.

The next was Leo II, (
http://en.academic.ru/pictures/enwiki/76=
/Lioconvoy_gathering.jpg ) the
adopted son of Lio Convoy, and who looked mu=
ch like him, and who had
obviously picked up many of his mannerisms. His bo=
dy was powerfully built
and heavily armored. He looked to turn into a lion.=


The third was Ramulus (http://tfwiki.net/wiki/Ramulus) who had like the
o=
thers been on patrol for a while, surveying the area and trying to keep it
=
free from Predacon invasion.

They also come up beside Rodimus, Leo II, obv=
iously the leader of the other
two, =93What now sir?=94

Rodimus looked at =
Quickstride and Uproar, =93Well let=92s get out of sight, and
then we can d=
iscuss it.=94

*Meanwhile Inside the Ark:*

Perceptor had received Tuscon=
=92s message and sent attempted to send a message
to Lord elder, however at=
 the moment there was no answer from the elder
Maximal.

At the same time L=
egacy was still standing in the med lab along with the
others, his single o=
ptic glowing in the darkness.

=93It would seem that Nightlight=92s vital s=
ystems are being held at minimal
levels.=94 Legacy said as he directed his =
gaze to the wall panel nearest
Nightlight. A small light blinked, indicatin=
g her spark was still online,
but that there was not enough power to reboot=
 her systems.

He turned to look at the others, his face glowing in the dar=
kness, lit by
his own optic, and the glowing bar on his chest plate. He rai=
sed his right
hand in the air, the one with the arm cannon on it and begin =
to emit light
from it, much like a flash light or a beacon so that the room=
 was
illuminated. He casually looked around, =93Perhaps we could locate a b=
ack out
or reserve power system . . . =93

Legacy paused as Tuscon=92s mess=
age came in. He turned to look at Santon, Bump
and Perceptor, a look of dis=
belief momentarily flashing across his face.

Legacy straightened as his co=
ld voice comes across the channel, =93I will not
comply with your command. =
I have been tasked with  . . . . >*BZZZTT!*<  . .
. the protection of the A=
rk as well as that of the Matrix. I will not
knowingly leave the Ark undefe=
nded or the Matrix in the hands of another.=94

Legacy turned to look at hi=
s console as he understoodf what happened.
Communications had been cut part=
 way through his message. He turned to look
at the others, his single optic=
 cold, =93It is illogical to believe that I
would attempt to harm the Ark o=
r allow anyone to take it from the Maximals.=94

(TAG)

Preston
